nodes.text: Outpost Puffs were a type of dessert that could be purchased in Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY.
Outpost Puffs can be purchased at the real-world Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo attraction at Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge in Disneys's Hollywood Studios. They were first announced on July 6, 2021.
